title: In for a Murder
short_cast: Anna Smołowik, Paweł Domagała, Szymon Bobrowski, Piotr Adamczyk, Dorota Segda, Rafał Królikowski, Przemysław Stippa, Jacek Knap, Olga Sarzyńska, Emma Giegżno
cast: Anna Smołowik, Paweł Domagała, Szymon Bobrowski, Piotr Adamczyk, Dorota Segda, Rafał Królikowski, Przemysław Stippa, Jacek Knap, Olga Sarzyńska, Emma Giegżno
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
m_reason: violence, mature themes, language, gore, crude humor
desc: A stay-at-home mom and avid reader of crime stories discovers the deepest secrets of a small town's residents while investigating a woman's murder.
